intro: One house. Endless waves. Will you survive the night?
description:
Last House Survival: Zombie Defense is an intense survival shooter where the last standing house becomes humanity’s final refuge. Build defenses, set traps, and face relentless waves of the undead determined to tear down your stronghold.
Choose your weapons, upgrade your defenses, and hold the line as each wave grows deadlier than the last. Every second counts in this fight for survival—because once the house falls, it’s game over.
